channel.title: kvm on mysite - there are many sites like it, but this one is mine
channel.description: Recent content in kvm on mysite - there are many sites like it, but this one is mine

item.description: Setting up a k8s local cluster on KVM is surprisingly non-intuative. Just the prescription needed to fill these long winter days! The rules are simple: command line only, using vi and tmux on a non ubuntu distro solutions must scale to the enterprise level, using little to no encryption use alpha code where at all possible hosting to be done via a 6Mb router with intact firmware Hints:
